name: RainMaker Securities
overview:
-About Rainmaker Securities-

RainMaker Securities LLC is a licensed general securities Broker/Dealer in U.S. Capital Markets, and a FINRA/SIPC member firm. The company provides a variety of services to issuers of private securities and investors in such sectories. We satisfy the needs of these two primary constituencies:

Emerging Growth Issuers : Emerging growth private companies looking to engage new markets, raise expansion capital, or find M&A partners. We provide expertise on the proper structure, pricing, and distribution strategy necessary to successfully place equity, debt, and/or hybrid securities, with RainMaker’s network of more than 800 sophisticated and demanding professional and private Investors.

Emerging Growth Investors : We offer our network of primarily Institutional/Professional Investors, a pre-filtered pipeline of well-structured, appropriately-priced, actionable investment opportunities in the securities of emerging growth private companies, led by talented and capable executive management teams who we’ve taken the time to get to know very well.

We focus on the following sector verticals:

-Enterprise Software -Consumer Electronics -Semi-conductors -Digital Media -Communication Technology / Wireless -Telecom Services -Green Technology -Commercial Real Estate

-Specialties-

Private Capital Sourcing, Private Mergers & Acquisitions, Intellectual Property Strategy and Sale, Strategic Business Development, Secondary Market Trading
